Kantabilon: Pleased to meet you! I am Melody Maestro Kantabilon! I'm a master of echo. I specialize in putting music into small gems known as Echo Crystals. Music lovers from throughout the kingdom have been bringing me their scores for years. If you like, I will make a crystal for you! It will only cost you 200 adena.
